reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Gaming Setup Organizer - Stylish and Functional!
reviews.reviewText: The KELJUN Controller Stand 3 Tier is a must-have for any serious gamer seeking to declutter their gaming space while adding a touch of style. This stand is a true multi-purpose gem, serving as a controller holder, headphone stand, and more. Its symmetrical design exudes modern elegance, and the build quality is top-notch, ensuring stability and durability. With adjustable tiers and thoughtful cable management features, this stand keeps your gear organized and easily accessible. Assembling it is a breeze, taking just minutes, and its compatibility with various gaming accessories makes it a smart addition to any setup. A game-changer for staying organized and elevating your gaming environment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what youre searching for
reviews.reviewText: As an avid gamer, I'm always looking for ways to streamline and optimize my gaming setup. That's why I was thrilled to discover the 3-Tier Controller Stand and Headphone Holder. Not only does it look great, but it's also incredibly functional and has made my gaming experience so much better.The three tiers of the controller stand provide ample space to store all of my controllers and keep them organized and easily accessible. Plus, the headphone holder is a game-changer - I no longer have to worry about my headphones getting tangled or lost. And because it's adjustable, I can customize it to fit my needs and preferences.Overall, I'm incredibly satisfied with this product. It's durable, practical, and has really helped me elevate my gaming setup. If you're a gamer looking for a way to declutter and organize your gaming area, I highly recommend the 3-Tier Controller Stand and Headphone Holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together, very stable, and saves a ton of space - just one minor cosmetic flaw
reviews.reviewText: My desk became very cluttered as I accumulated computer and gaming gear, so I've been looking at gear organizers to make the best use of space. I considered other form factors, like hooks on the wall or under my desk. Because I use them all the time, I decided to get this multi-stand to keep the gear on top of my desk and easy to reach.This stand does exactly what I need. In my case, it's holding my headphones and three full-sized gamepad controllers. I reclaimed a whole bunch of desk space, because now all four items fit in the space that one of them used to take on its own. And there's room for more!It has six "shelves" to hold stuff. The foot of each shelf has a soft pad to protect your gear and keep it from slipping. The edges of the stand are polished, so I'm not worried about scratches if I bump gear into it by accident.The stand also includes grooves for cable management, to help keep it tidy. I use a single four-way fast charging USB C cable (https://amzn.to/3Hh8CyK - highly recommended) to charge all four pieces of gear at once while minimizing cable clutter.I could easily fit one more item (another controller, or my Switch, for example) on the open shelf, and in a pinch one more item on the shelf that's between my headphone ear cups. Even with this much stuff on it, the weighted base keeps it stable. I've had it loaded up for a couple of months and have never knocked it over or had something fall off.Assembly was simple. There's no set height or angle of orientation for each pair of shelves, so you position them where you want and tighten the knobs. After tightening, the shelves are locked in place, but this is also the cause of my one-star deduction. You have to crank the knob pretty tight to keep the shelves secure, but this results in some metal on metal grinding, scratching the post where the knob touches it.These minor scratches are purely cosmetic and don't affect the sturdiness of the stand. But in my case, I had to move the shelves around a few times before I found my optimal setup, so my stand has some exposed scratches. I only notice them if I'm really looking, so I debated whether to even deduct a star. If minor scratches don't bother you, consider this a five-star review.I highly recommend this multi-stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and quality product
reviews.reviewText: Holds my nintendo and xbox controllers very well. Definitely recommend it cleans up space nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described. We have 3 Playstation 5 & 3 Nintendo Switch controllers, this is perfect for us!! Definitely room if you want to hang headphones and/or controllers. No instructions but so easy/obvious how to assemble. Can adjust the shelving height. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 2 oldest boys and they were very happy! They have so many controllers in their rooms. I’m happy with it because they won’t loose them so often and it’s less mess to look at!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Controller Stand
reviews.reviewText: First, this was very easy to assemble. I opened the box and put it together while standing at the kitchen table. You can set the controller rests (1, 2, or all 3) at any height you want and turn them in any direction. I was skeptical of the small platforms that the controller sits on but it hasn't been an issue. The base is large enough to prevent any wobble when adding or removing controllers to the tower. You can even run a USB cable up the tower to charge your controllers in place!Aside from assembly, function, and features, this thing just looks cool (pics for proof). How awesome is a tower of controllers? Anyways, 5 out of 5! I will likely purchase another.*I did also test with headphones, and they work but looks a little funny. Cloud Orbit might just be too big for this thing, aesthetically. I wasn't really looking for a headphone stand anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The actual racks themselves aren't stable
reviews.reviewText: While the product looks sturdy and durable, the way the racks attach to the pole is very unintuitive. They use screws with nothing on the end to prevent them from scratching the pole, and also doesn't make for a very secure fit. Also, Gamecube controllers pretty much won't fit on this, as mine keeps falling off. The upsides to it are it hold standard controllers well and seems like it'd last a good while, and it was very easy to assemble.

Holds up pretty well, sturdy and looks good. Can fit 2 controllers on one side and a headset on the other. Easy to assemble and doesn’t look cheap and doesn’t over when one side is heavier then the other
Por el precio y si no quieres algo tan exótico te lo recomiendo
Bought this as a gift for a friend. Serving its purpose as it helps to organize the controllers and headphones
Finally, all my controllers are properly stacked.Strong and sturdy design.Value for money.
Muy contenta, buen material, fácil de armar y resistente
